author: reinhard
msg: Pass sitemap and input parameters separately to prevent conflicts and make explicit which parameters are part of the configuration (iow sitemap) and which are part of the input (iow request).

author: jstrachan
msg: added a patch for CAMEL-412 https://issues.apache.org/activemq/browse/CAMEL-412 to support the DOT file execution being disbled via the pom.xml via the <configuration><useDot>false</useDot></configuration> option

msg: Add default value for ProtocolEcho. (backport of r654507)
